record.text:
They say time flies when you're having fun.

The opposite is also true.

When the world is in this stressful of a state, days can feel like weeks.

Why?

Because our brains respond to stress by paying more attention.

It's gonna be a long 4 years.

It may feel like 40.

Help everyone #cope.

external.title: a close up of a clock face with roman numerals including xii
external.description:
Alt: It's going to be a long four years of feeling like we are all stuck in the same moment.

Help your friends and family stay as sane as they can.
